author: DANIEL ZELTER
subject: A Cool Mistake
body:
Apparently the list was a lot longer, according to www.animenewsservice.com 
They were categories of the best 100 for favorite series, favorite theme 
song, and favorite characters. Listed under the 9/12/00 section of "Anime 
Polls" is all of the shows, and 50 of the characters. And guess what? Jigen, 
Fujiko, and Goemon made the list for characters! Jigen is number 17, and 
Fujiko is 28. Goemon is 43, but he beat Kenshin! I'm just proud that there 
are SOME people who don't think that just cus an anime has better cel 
quality than one from 20 years ago, that it automatically makes it better 
than the older anime. LUPIN FOREVER!! Since it only shows 50 characters, 
Zenigata might be on there later. I wish he was on there now though. Oh 
well. 4/5 ain't bad.
